|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC55 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = U |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, access point, media bridge |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAC55U |icid = 3568A-RTAC55U |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9557;QCA9557-AT4A, PRY693.002C, 1343, CHINA; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Zentel;A5U1GA31ATS-BC; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T1G164QG-BCF7; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, E56549.1B, 1411, TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AC:9E:17 |oui = AC:9E:17
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = AiCloud support |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;207, 649E, 421;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85402;SKY85402, 342HR, 1342 MY;2; ,,, USB 3.0 Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;EtronTech, EJ168A, S074207, MSS20001;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/10/2014 |estreldate = 02/24/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIADZJ5W23532 |asin = B00TZ7GZ7Q |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, NHR736.001B, 1340, TAIWAN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC photos indicate this device has a :single USB 2.0 and a single USB 3.0 port. Default settings are per the FCC label.
===Specifications=== *Product class: ''AC1200'' (300Mbps [2.4 GHz] + 867Mbps [5 GHz]) *Antennas: 2x external dipole antenna w/ RP-SMA connector *Ports: USB: 1x ''USB 2.0'', 1x ''USB 3.0'' :Ethernet: 1x WAN, 4x LAN (10/100/1000 Base-T) *Power Supply: :AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output: 12V with max. 2A current *Vendor firmware operation modes: :wireless router, access point, media bridge * Vendor firmware features: :''AiCloud'', USB file / printer / scanner sharing [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC55U/], :''ASUSWRT'' interface, ''Smart QoS'' <small>([https://www.qca.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-streamboost/ StreamBoost?])</small> *<small>''ASUS'''s product page also notes this product has 'AiRadar' support :(whatever that marketing term is), yet the blurb indicates usage of a :[[Broadcom]] chipset which contradicts the FCC filing for this device.</small>
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/asus_rt-ac55u ''Asus RT-AC55U'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.hardware-boom.com/asus-rt-ac55u-review/ On '''Hardware-Boom'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac55u.shtml On '''iXBT'''] (RU)
===Forum threads=== *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-1800-1-1.html On '''koolshare.cn'''] :F/W Ver.: V3.0.0.4.374 :S/N: EBICRxxxxxxx :MAC: AC9E17xxxxxx :PSU: DVE DSA-24PFD-15 FCH 120200 ::AC: 100~240V ~50/60Hz 0.8A ::DC: +12V รท2A
